name: Dummy Royale - PYGAME
description:
Dummy Royale is a game that I worked on as a school project and decided to work on it afterwards. It is a free to play single player battle royale game, performance can be slightly on the iffy side. I used A* pathfinding for enemy Ai following this tutorial.

The game is made with Python and makes use of Pygame.

Assets used:

Weapons from Delthor Games - https://delthor-games.itch.io/free-low-poly-weapons-pack-3

Tile Set from Stealthix‘- https://stealthix.itch.io/rpg-nature-tileset
